packagegui.note: This <acronym title="Hypertext Markup Language">HTML</acronym> page uses default values, hence even if each field is set, you are still required to save this page if you are editing this page for the very first time!

field.description: Select here which type of scanner you want to use.
Specify the returncode(s) which the scanner returns when the mail is infected.
Some scanners can report more than good or infected. Place valid return codes here that will enable the message to be delivered without a warning.
Specify here a regular expression which describes where the name of the virus can be found.
Tick this if we should parse all <acronym title="Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions">MIME</acronym>-sections instead of passing the message as-is to the scanner.
